about_the_game:
In Natives, players take on the role of a Native American. The game combines traditional hunting and tracking techniques, such as tracking wildlife, gathering resources, and exploring the environment, with a unique crafting and trading system that enables players to design, trade and make items. The game also includes a wide range of native themes and symbols, as well as symbols that represent different characters and creatures in the game. Players are challenged to manage resources and trade with neighboring tribes. With a variety of activities to engage with, Natives is an immersive and unique experience that gives players a unique insight into the lives and culture of native people.

Natives is an open-world/sandbox game with survival elements that takes place pre-Christopher Columbus. The land is raw, nature is at its peak and the seasons are full of change.

Battle Other Natives for life or death.

Discover new crafting schematics

Search the land for lost treasures
